short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that allows you to easily open Instagram images and videos in a pop-up window for a better browsing experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Currently usable on Instagram, this extension allows you to open images and videos in a new tab with a right-click -> "Pop".
It works with:

- Images and videos from opened posts
- Opened reels
- Stories (all highlights and some of the newly posted ones)
